lead_paragraph: The Thursday debate was Fox News’s second-highest rated program in the network’s 20-year-history.

headline.print_headline: Even Without You-Know-Who, Debate Still Drew 12.5 Million Viewers
headline.main: G.O.P. Debate Without Trump Draws 12.5 Million Viewers

snippet: The Thursday debate was Fox News’s second-highest rated program in the network’s 20-year-history.
abstract: Nielsen reports Fox News Republican debate drew 12.5 million viewers, second-lowest viewership figure of seven Republican debates; Donald J Trump declined to participate in debate, but ratings drop is not as low as his campaign predicted.
